plays.text: Penalty to Michal Handzus 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Craig Johnson
Penalty to Ken Belanger 2 minutes for Slashing(opposing player not identified)

Goal scored by Glen Murray assisted by Steve Heinze and Bryan Smolinski
Penalty to Aaron Miller 2 minutes for Elbowing(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Claude Lemieux 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Shane Doan 2 minutes for Tripping Jozef Stumpel
Penalty to Jozef Stumpel 2 minutes for Elbowing Claude Lemieux
Goal scored by Claude Lemieux unassisted
Penalty to Daniel Briere 2 minutes for Boarding Aaron Miller
Penalty to Ian Laperriere 2 minutes for Tripping Danny Markov
Goal scored by Bryan Smolinski assisted by Steve Heinze and Glen Murray
Penalty to Mattias Norstrom 2 minutes for Holding Ladislav Nagy
Penalty to Jaroslav Bednar 2 minutes for Tripping(opposing player not identified)
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Steve Heinze
Goal scored by Daniel Briere assisted by Shane Doan and Michal Handzus
Penalty to Brad May 2 minutes for Tripping Kelly Buchberger
Penalty to Tyler Bouck 2 minutes for High Sticking Philippe Boucher
